name: LegibilityWeight
desc: The Accessibility Bold Text user setting options.

items.name: case regular
items.desc: Use regular font weight (no Accessibility Bold).

items.name: case bold
items.desc: Use heavier font weight (force Accessibility Bold).

items.name: init?(UILegibilityWeight)
items.desc: Creates a legibility weight from its UILegibilityWeight equivalent.

items.name: static func == (LegibilityWeight, LegibilityWeight) -> Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether two legibility weights are equal.

items.name: static func != (Self, Self) -> Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether two legibility weights are unequal.

items.name: func hash(into: inout Hasher)
items.desc: Hashes the essential components of the legibility weight by passing them into the given hash function.

items.name: var hashValue: Int
items.desc: The hashed value of the legibility weight.
